request.description:
## Pass lineId to create user or return existing user.

 ----

## Response data

	* message : "User exist" or "Create User"
	* token : "Jwt Token"

response.name: POST User (create)
POST User (Exist)

request.description:
## Update Status for specific User by userId (wipId)

> avilable value for attribute "status"
>  * accept		: for accept user agreement.
>  * register	: for finish update a profile for the first time.
>  * major		: for finish answer the major question.
>  * general		: for finish answer the general question.
>  * submit		: for finish upload the document.

----

## Response data

	* Model User

> the answer (request body) must have
>   * file : upload file must be (.pdf) and file must not larger than 5MB

request.description:
## Get Users information
> get amount of user that register today and yesterday and percentage.

----

	* yesterday	: amount,
	* today		: amount,
	* percent	: the percentage by (today / yesterday)

> get amount of user that currently in that status and total user in the system.

----

## Response data

	* total				: amount,
	* accepted			: amount,
	* registered		: amount,
	* generalAnswered	: amount,
	* majorAnswered		: amount,
	* submitted			: amount
